EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Cloud Foundry Meet-up London_Q414.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for London Cloud Foundry Meetup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Pivotal at London Cloud Foundry User Group Meetup <http://www.meetup.com/London-Cloud-Foundry-User-Group-LCFUG-Meetup/events/218940527/> We are delighted to invite you to our LCFUG meetup <http://www.meetup.com/London-Cloud-Foundry-User-Group-LCFUG-Meetup/events/218940527/> on Tuesday 16th December at Pivotal London.
Join us <http://www.meetup.com/London-Cloud-Foundry-User-Group-LCFUG-Meetup/events/218940527/> for an evening of discussion, technical sessions and networking with other dedicated community members. Be a part of the LCFUG meetup to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Source Platform-as-a-Service.
AGENDA:
- Cloud Paranoia - Cloud Foundry, Confidential data, Public clouds James Masson is senior engineer at CloudCredo, delivering Cloud Foundry and BOSH consultancy to customers of CloudCredo and Pivotal.
- Building Containers for Fun and Profit Learn how to build a container from scratch using each of the namespaces. The speaker Julian Friedman, is a Cloud Foundry specialist at IBM.
We will provide some food, beers and soft drinks. We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team REGISTER NOW! <http://www.meetup.com/London-Cloud-Foundry-User-Group-LCFUG-Meetup/events/218940527/>
